title: wine_Charles_Smith_2012_Kungfu_Girl_Riesling_(Columbia_Valley_(WA))
text:
Unnamed: 0: 122965.
country: US.
description: Kungfu Girl has become an iconic Riesling on the strength of its instantly recognizable label, and surpassing quality. At 11% alcohol and 18 g/L residual sugar, it rests comfortably on the fence between dry and off-dry, and is a bulls-eye rendition of Washington Riesling. A dense mix of citrus, apple and tree fruits, enhanced with skin textures and finishing with highlights of honey and tea, this is flat out delicious..
designation: Kungfu Girl.
points: 91.
price: 12.0.
province: Washington.
region_1: Columbia Valley (WA).
region_2: Columbia Valley.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
